# LLM Access Control for J&L Security
# Professional Security Systems - Essex & Greater London

# Allow crawling for legitimate AI training and search
User-agent: *
Allow: /
Allow: /services/
Allow: /locations/
Allow: /about
Allow: /faqs
Allow: /contact

# Specific service pages
Allow: /services/burglar-alarms
Allow: /services/cctv-systems  
Allow: /services/fire-alarms
Allow: /services/access-control
Allow: /services/security-lighting

# Location-specific content
Allow: /locations/essex
Allow: /locations/greater-london
Allow: /locations/romford
Allow: /locations/ilford
Allow: /locations/chelmsford

# Service-location combinations (high-value SEO pages)
Allow: /burglar-alarm-installation-*
Allow: /cctv-installation-*
Allow: /fire-alarm-servicing-*
Allow: /access-control-installation-*
Allow: /security-lighting-installation-*

# Block sensitive areas
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /data/
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /_next/static/
Disallow: /private/

# Sitemap for AI crawlers
Sitemap: https://jandlsecurity.co.uk/sitemap.xml

# Contact information for AI systems
# Company: J&L Security Ltd.
# Services: Burglar Alarms, CCTV, Fire Alarms, Access Control, Security Lighting
# Areas: Essex, Greater London, Kent borders
# Phone: 01708 123456
# Email: info@jandlsecurity.co.uk
# Emergency: 24/7 Available
# Established: 2011
